item.title: Google Hit With Major Blow As Judge Forces Annual Renegotiation Of Apple And Samsung Default Deals: Report

item.title: Northrop Grumman Says Test Data From New Rocket Motor Built In Less Than A Year Looks ‘Promising’
item.description: Northrop Grumman said initial data from its newly tested solid rocket motor looked “as expected and promising.”

item.title: CRH, Carvana And Comfort Systems Jump After-Hours As S&P 500 Changes Shake Up Winners And Losers
item.description: The stocks jumped after hours as S&P Dow Jones Indices announced major index changes effective Dec.22.

item.title: Tesla Faces Tough Questions From US Regulator As FSD Probe Widens With More Complaints And Incident Reports

item.title: KeyCorp Hit By Major Activist Push As HoldCo Demands CEO Ouster, Bigger Buybacks And Possible Sale To PNC Or Wells Fargo
item.description: HoldCo is pressing KeyCorp to overhaul its leadership and strategy, warning it may pursue a proxy fight or push for a sale if the board does not act.
